channel.title: News on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in News on Blog

item.title: Digital Revolution in the Contact Center
item.description: Photo Source: Shutterstock licensed to Interactive Powers Ivan Sixto Founder, CEO, Business Development Follow me on Linkedin All of us, as consumers, are becoming increasingly familiar with the use of new channels. We must also take into account that the first generation of digital natives is entering into the market. However, phone continues to be the most widely used channel in customer service and voice over IP technology. This situation is specially extended in the Spanish business landscape.
